trans-unit.source: Defines methods for obtaining and releasing an existing handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos para a obter e liberar um identificador existente para um contexto de dispositivo do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A device context defines the graphics object for drawing on a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de dispositivo define o objeto de elementos gráficos para desenho em um dispositivo baseado em Windows.

trans-unit.source: An example of a class that implements the <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> interface is the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> interface é a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the handle to a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o identificador de um contexto de dispositivo Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> representing the handle of a device context.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> que representa o identificador de um contexto de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> dois métodos que permitem que você obtenha e liberar o identificador para um dispositivo baseado em Windows.

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve seguir uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> com uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> quando tiver terminado com o identificador do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> is not designed to obtain handles created using Windows GDI methods such as `CreateDC` or `CreateCompatibleDC`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> não foi projetado para obter identificadores criados usando os métodos de GDI do Windows, como `CreateDC` ou `CreateCompatibleDC`.

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle of a Windows device context.
trans-unit.target: Libera o identificador de um contexto de dispositivo Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> are two methods that allow you to get and release the handle for a Windows-based device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> dois métodos que permitem que você obtenha e liberar o identificador para um dispositivo baseado em Windows.

trans-unit.source: You should always follow a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> with a call to <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> when you are finished with the Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: Você sempre deve seguir uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.GetHdc%2A> com uma chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext.ReleaseHdc%2A> quando tiver terminado com o identificador do Windows.
